about_the_game:
Starter Card Frames is an asset pack containing 30+ unique Card Frames to suit a variety of games. Each Card Frame is available in PNG (224 x 384 px) and PSD format so you can use them right away or customize them further in your preferred image editing software.

If you are using Card Game Combat plugin these assets will be a perfect fit!

●30+ Card Frames made for use in any game project, featuring a variety of Materials and Themes.

●High-quality PNGs and PSDs for each letting you customize all elements.

●Bonus Pack of Icons for decorating Cards or use for stats and symbols.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

【Materials (14 frames)】

・Wood

・Clay

・Brick

・Bamboo

・Concrete

・Engraved

・Marble

・Wool

・Hologram

・Parchment

・Denim

・Plain

・Inkbrush

・Camo

【Themes (16 frames)】

・Fire

・Water

・Earth

・Air

・Holy

・Dark

・Spring

・Autumn

・Winter

・Medieval - Light

・Medieval - Dark

・Cyberpunk - Chrome

・Cyberpunk - Neon

・Steampunk

・Space Opera

・Magical Girl

・Bonus Icon Pack with 10 Card Icons

-----

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
